CustomField.description: This field is optional. It describes the portion of the account balance to be converted, transferred, or directly rolled over. In the case of a recharacterization, it is the contribution amount plus earnings attributable to be recharacterized.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describes the portion of the account balance to be converted transferred or directly rolled over or in the case of a recharacterization the contribution amount plus earnings attributable to be recharacterized.
CustomField.label: Portion Description
